title: Correct documentation cross-references and minor inconsistencies

comment: Pre-review complete. Verified all seven proposed changes against source files: (1) qa.md line 56 incorrectly references Section 12 instead of Section 5.1 - confirmed, (2) CLAUDE.md line 142 misleadingly references SOP-002 for Air Gap specification - confirmed, (3) bu.md effective date 2026-01-01 inconsistent with other agent files using 2026-01-02 - confirmed, (4) SOP-002 Section 5 conflicts with SOP-001 Section 9.7.1 on CR ID reuse - confirmed, (5) CR template contains manual metadata prohibited by SOP-001 Section 5.4 - confirmed, (6) qms.py line 178 restricts route to initiators only - confirmed, (7) cmd_checkout does not archive effective versions - confirmed. No TU reviewers required - changes are documentation fixes and QMS infrastructure code, not domain-specific application code. Recommend approval.

Post-review: Execution substantially incomplete. Only 1 of 8 planned changes was implemented (CLAUDE.md SOP-002 reference removal - verified correct). The remaining 7 changes were blocked: 5 by Edit tool errors (qa.md, bu.md, qms.py x3) and 2 by QMS workflow requirements (SOP-001, SOP-002). The CR title promises 'QA permissions and archive bug' but neither was delivered. Recommend one of: (1) Revert to IN_EXECUTION to retry blocked changes with alternative approaches, (2) Revise CR scope to document only the completed change and create follow-up CRs for remaining items, or (3) If Edit tool issues are environmental and cannot be resolved, document this in CR and proceed with partial completion - but CR title/scope must be updated to reflect actual deliverables.

reason: Retrying blocked changes with alternative approach

comment: Post-review complete. All six executable changes verified: (1) qa.md line 56 now correctly references Section 5.1 instead of Section 12, (2) CLAUDE.md line 142 no longer contains misleading SOP-002 reference, (3) bu.md line 94 effective date aligned to 2026-01-02, (4) qms.py CR template (lines 583-605) now contains clean structure with no manual metadata per SOP-001 Section 5.4, (5) qms.py line 178 route permission now includes qa group enabling fast-track workflow, (6) qms.py lines 715-719 now archive effective version before creating draft on checkout. The two SOP changes (SOP-002 CR ID reuse clarification and SOP-001 permission matrix update) correctly require separate QMS revision workflows and are out of scope for code execution. Recommend approval.
